subject: Thank you for registering for Opal!
body: Thank you for registering for the Opal app.
If you haven't already downloaded the app, please open one of the links below on your mobile device to start the download process.
Once installed, launch the application and sign in with the username and password you created when you registered.
If you have any problems with the app, please contact us at opal@muhc.mcgill.ca or by using the Feedback form available on the General tab of Opal.

If you find the app useful, please let us know by rating it and leaving us a comment on the App Store or Google Play store. We are working hard to make Opal useful and empowering for our patients, and we appreciate your feedback.
